original_text: Because of this, God has promised that he will do very great and valuable things for us. As a result, you can do what is right, like God does. The people who belong to this world want to do bad things. Those bad things make them become worse and worse. But God gives you the power to be free from all that.
korean_text: 이로써 그 보배롭고 지극히 큰 약속을 우리에게 주사 이 약속으로 말미암아 너희가 정욕 때문에 세상에서 썩어질 것을 피하여 신성한 성품에 참여하는 자가 되게 하려 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Because of this, God has promised
that he will do very great and valuable things for us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리를 위해 매우 위대하고 귀한 일을 행하실 것이라고

sentences.original_text: As a result, you can do what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과로, 너는 옳은 일을 할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: The people who belong to this world
Those bad things make them become worse and worse
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나쁜 일들은 그들을 점점 더 나빠지게 만듭니다

sentences.original_text: But God gives you the power
to be free from all that
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 것으로부터 자유롭게 되는 힘을
